mapper.insert: insert into sys_resource (id, sort, function_id, code, `name`, operate_type, after_url, route_url, getway, `use`, `type`, `checked`, component, dep_code, creator, create_date, update_date, remark ) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{functionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operateType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{afterUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{routeUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{getway,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{use,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{checked,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{component,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{depCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update:
update sys_resource
sort = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER},
function_id = #{functionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
operate_type = #{operateType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
after_url = #{afterUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
route_url = #{routeUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
getway = #{getway,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`use` = #{use,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`checked` = #{checked,jdbcType=INTEGER},
component = #{component,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dep_code = #{depCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, sort, function_id, code, `name`, operate_type, after_url, route_url, getway, `use`, `type`, `checked`, component, dep_code, creator, create_date, update_date, remark from sys_resource where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select id, sort, function_id, code, `name`, operate_type, after_url, route_url, getway, `use`, `type`, `checked`, component, dep_code, creator, create_date, update_date remark from sys_resource where del_status= 1

select a.* from sys_resource a where 1=1 and del_status= 1
and a.name like concat('%',#{name},'%')

select a.* from sys_resource a where a.function_id = #{functionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and del_status= 1
and a.name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
and a.checked = #{checked}
and a.dep_code like concat('%',#{depCode},'%')

select a.* from sys_resource a where a.type =3 and del_status= 1
and a.name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
select a.id, a.name,a.type,a.code,a.after_url from sys_resource a where a.function_id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and del_status= 1 order by a.sort asc

select a.resource_id as resourceId from sys_role_function_resource a where a.role_id in
#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select id, sort, function_id, code, `name`, operate_type, after_url, route_url, getway, `use`, `type`, `checked`, component, dep_code, creator, create_date, update_date, remark from sys_resource where del_status = 1 and id in
#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update:
update sys_resource set `del_status` = 0 where id in
#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, sort, function_id, code, `name`, operate_type, after_url, route_url, getway, `use`, `type`, `checked`, component, dep_code, creator, create_date, update_date, remark from sys_resource where after_url = #{afterUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and del_status = 1
